languages.text: "На нас напали по пути сюда. Как вы объясните это?"
"We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"
languages.original_text: "На нас напали по пути сюда. Как вы объясните это?"

traits.locale_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"
"We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"
"We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"
"We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

languages.text: “我们来这里的路上遭到了袭击，你们打算怎么解释？”
languages.original_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

traits.locale_text: “我们来这里的路上遭到了袭击，你们打算怎么解释？”

languages.text: «Nos atacaron por el camino. ¿Cómo explica eso?».
languages.original_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

traits.locale_text: «Nos atacaron por el camino. ¿Cómo explica eso?».

languages.text: 「ここに来る途中で攻撃を受けた。どういうことだ？」
languages.original_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

traits.locale_text: 「ここに来る途中で攻撃を受けた。どういうことだ？」

languages.text: "Wir wurden auf dem Weg attackiert. Wie erklärt Ihr das?"
languages.original_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir wurden auf dem Weg attackiert. Wie erklärt Ihr das?"

languages.text: « Les vôtres nous ont attaqués en chemin. J'exige des explications. »
languages.original_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

traits.locale_text: « Les vôtres nous ont attaqués en chemin. J'exige des explications. »

languages.text: "Buraya gelirken saldırıya uğradık. Bu konuyu izah eder misin?"
languages.original_text: "We were attacked on the way here. How do you explain that?"

traits.locale_text: "Buraya gelirken saldırıya uğradık. Bu konuyu izah eder misin?"
